description: Shared Services Canada – Tier 2 – Systems Administrators- LV2-LV3 (Storage and Backup)
full_summary:
# **Termination ID # : R-146552** 
# **Title: Shared Services Canada -TBIPS - Tier 2 - Systems Administrators (Storage & Backup) ** 
# **Publication Date: November 3, 2023 ** 
## **Notice of Proposed Procurement: Systems Administrators - Level 2- Level 3 (Storage and Backup)** 
###  **Notice Details:**

*   **Solicitation Number:** R-146552
*   **Contracting Entity:** Shared Services Canada
*   **Contracting Authority:** Anne-Marie Ouellette
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Email: anniversary.ouellette@ssc-spc.gc.ca
    *   Phone: (613) 286-0218

## **Eligibility:**
###  **Notice Eligibility:**
This proposed procurement is open to only Learning Services Supply Arrangement (SA) holders with a valid Tender Notice Invitation number.

## **Additional Requirements:**

*   **Notice Language:** The proposed systems administrators must be fluent in both English and French, capable of communicating without assistance, and showing minimal errors in writing and oral communications.
*   **Security Level:** The proposed systems administrators will be working at the Secret level.
*   **Number of Required Resources:** As per the proposal document, it is expected that there will be one system administrator at the solicitation stage, with an estimation of up to six at the tasking stage.
*   **Period of Performance:**
    *   The intended contract is initially for 1 year, with the option to extend for an additional three 1-year periods.
*   **Contract Value:**
    *   As per the tender specifications, the maximum contract value can vary

## **Proposed Assessment Criteria:**
*   The proposed systems administrators will be evaluated based on a combined rating of:
        *   Technical Merit
        *   Price
*   Proposals are to be submitted and evaluated based on the criteria specified in Schedule C, Pricing and Evaluation, of the Tender Notice

## **Relevant Contract Clauses:**
### **Contacting Entity Preferences**
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier in this proposed procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.

### **Definition of a Certifying Entity:**
*   As per the Notice of Proposed Procurement, a Certifying Entity is considered to be an organization that has been certified under the "TBIPS" method of supply

### **
